items.title: More than 140 African Migrants Feared Dead In Boat Disaster Near Yemen
items.description: The vessel capsized along a heavily traveled but treacherous route for Africans transiting the war-torn country to find work in the rich Gulf states.

items.title: El Salvador’s Leader Is Autocrat to Some, Godsend to Others
items.description: Lawmakers approved constitutional changes abolishing term limits and allowing President Nayib Bukele to stay in power indefinitely. Why now?
